name: Spirit of Dating
description:
A game made for UF's Telephone game jam by team Bean Spillers.

Prompt:

Reverse Matchmaker, you're trying to ruin dates.

Members:

  • James "Chris" Obeso - Scripting
  • Ritvik Komaragiri - Scripting, modeling, etc.
  • Adam Gonedridge - Scene and Character Modeling
  • Kevin James - Music, Scripting, UX

Sources:

  • Intro song by Kevin Macleod
